text: bhumiya tama deviyange ‘alokaya’magin alokamatva bæbalenneya. (ovunovunge) satahan pituva (ovun idiriye) tabanu læbe. nabivarunvada, (ovunge anit) saksinda gena enu læba, ovun atare sadharana lesa tindu denu læbe. (ovunge pin valin ek anu pramanayak ho adu kara ho, papayangen ek anu pramanayak ho vædi kara ho) ovunta aparadhayak karanu labannema næta
